column_description: A unique identifier for each student's answer
The ID of the exam in which the question was asked
The ID of the question that the student answered
The ID of the student who provided the answer
The date and time when the student submitted the answer
Additional comments or notes related to the student's answer
A flag indicating whether the answer was satisfactory (1 for yes, 0 for no)
The actual text or choice provided by the student as their answer
